title: Content Burnout vs Authenticity
tension: I know I need to produce content to grow, but the process feels draining and inauthentic.
belief: Content must be 'performed' and polished to be valuable (The Performance Belief).
core: Content shouldn't be a performance; it should be a documented extension of your thinking.
hooks: Viết như hơi thở (Write like breathing)
rtb: Based on the proven 'Inside School' methodology of self-discovery.
mechanism: Frameworks that extract your inner thoughts into posts.

title: Conversion Anxiety
tension: I get likes and comments, but nobody is buying, and I feel like a fraud.
belief: Higher Traffic always equals Higher Revenue (The Traffic Fallacy).
core: People don't buy information; they buy clarity and trust.
hooks: Người ta mua người bán (People buy People)
promise: High conversion rates from smaller audiences.
rtb: Case studies of students selling high-ticket items with small followings.

title: The 'Expert' Trap
tension: I feel I need to know *everything* before I can teach *anything*.
core: You only need to be one step ahead to help someone behind you. The value is in the shared journey, not the pedestal.
hooks: Đừng chờ hoàn hảo (Don't wait for perfection)
promise: Confidence to share without Imposter Syndrome.

title: Silent Consumption
tension: People read my posts but don't like/comment, making me feel invisible.
core: The most valuable customers often watch in silence (The 'Dark Social'). They buy trust, not the 'like' button.
rtb: Tracking data shows sales come from non-engagers.

title: Thu hẹp để Mở rộng (Niche Paralysis)
tension: Tôi sợ nếu chọn ngách quá hẹp sẽ mất đi cơ hội với những khách hàng khác.
core: Sự cụ thể tạo ra lực hút (Specificity is magnetic). Cố gắng nói với tất cả mọi người là không nói với ai cả.
reframe: Từ 'Bỏ lỡ cơ hội' sang 'Sở hữu thị trường riêng'.
